Description: Fragment of Attic black-glazed pottery plate, giving complete profile. Fine, reddish-yellow (5 YR 6/6) clay. Glossy black glaze inside and out; underside reserved.
Curator's comments: Object owned and held by Akademisches Kunstmuseum. This record is included in the British Museum database as part of the Museum’s Naukratis Project, a research collaboration that aims to virtually re-unite finds from the ancient port city of Naukratis, now distributed over 80 museums worldwide.
Bibliographic references: Piekarski 2001 / Die Keramik aus Naukratis im Akademischen Kunstmuseum Bonn (p.48 no. D 18 pl. 22.2)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (ID.039)
